title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses Kyler Murray wiping his social media accounts clean of anything relating to the Cardinals and what the real story behind this is telling you. He wonders if Tom Brady is looking at a potential return to the NFL after announcing his retirement last week. He talks about the status of the Lakers right now as Russell Westbrook continues to struggle and what the Lakers can do in order to contend for another championship. Plus, USC head coach Lincoln Riley joins the show to defend his recruiting tactics landing several of the top transfer portal players. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
